N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 382.34 - Additional criteria for belowground disposal only

State Regulations

In addition to the requirements of sections 382.31 and
382.32
of this Part, disposal units
for belowground disposal intended to contain any Class C waste must be designed
to resist inadvertent intrusion for a period of at least 500 years or must
provide for the placement of Class C waste so that the top of the Class C waste
is a minimum of five meters below the top surface of the cover
material. Notes
